clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of depression A19792

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Setiptiline is a tertacyclic antidepressant A19792 It acts to reduce the symptoms of major depressive disorder

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tranylcypromine is combined with Setiptiline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Phenelzine is combined with Setiptiline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Selegiline is combined with Setiptiline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Moclobemide is combined with Setiptiline

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Pargyline is combined with Setiptiline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Minaprine is combined with Setiptiline

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Nialamide is combined with Setiptiline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Pirlindole is combined with Setiptiline

The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydracarbazine is combined with Setiptiline
